name: Sandwich: Maker Puzzle
description: There is a new cooking game in town, we call it the cooking of the most delicious, loved, amazing, colorful sandwiches in the culinary world. People enjoy these every day and love it to bits. We introduce you our new cooking game but WAIT!! There is a twist, this is not a typical Cooking game rather it’s a cooking game for Sandwiches. Yes!! You heard it right! This is our new application called The Sandwich Maker.
